files.patch:
@@ -229,1 +229,1 @@
-    EXPECT_EQ(strcmp(result, (expected)), 0) << "Failed with"  \
+    EXPECT_STREQ((result), (expected)) << "Failed with"        \
@@ -231,3 +231,1 @@
-        << " value '"    << (value)    << "'"                  \
-        << " result '"   << result     << "'"                  \
-        << " expected '" << (expected) << "'";                 \
+        << " value '"    << (value);                           \
